projects.title: #weArethefuture Campaign
projects.description: Brainstorm & collaborate creative content for social media channels. Propose & manage social media channels, messaging, calendar, monitor performance and engagement for the modern footwear brand.
highlights: Insta Stories and feed content creation

projects.title: Online/Offline Marketing Communication
projects.description: Building essential communication channels and contents for audience outreach including we-are.com website, lookbook, brochure, and integrated online/offline marketing materials.

projects.title: Community & Influencers
projects.description: Community building and influencer partnership programs across multiple brands including CorelDRAW Masters program and weAre the future ambassador network featuring leaders, influencers, thinkers, entrepreneurs, and game changers.

projects.title: Partnership & Co-marketing
projects.description: Strategic partnership and co-marketing initiatives including YouTube FanFest collaboration and retail partnership programs.
highlights: YouTube x weAre the future FanFest collaboration
